sentences.sContent: She took a colander and, of course, first of all we would wash the lettuce, that goes without saying.
sentences.sContent_eng: She took a colander and, of course, first of all we would wash the lettuce, that goes without saying.
sentences.sCn: 她会找一个滤锅,当然，先洗菜。

sentences.sContent: Simply place a dry coffee filter in a clean drip coffee filter basket or colander, and place the basket or colander over a clean dry pitcher or bowl.
sentences.sContent_eng: Simply place a dry coffee filter in a clean drip coffee filter basket or colander, and place the basket or colander over a clean dry pitcher or bowl.
sentences.sCn: 只需将一个干的咖啡滤纸放在干净的滤器中，然后将滤器放在干的干净水罐或碗上即可。

trans.tranOther: a metal or plastic bowl with a lot of small holes in the bottom and sides, used to separate liquid from food
